data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The problem with my superiors at work is that they don't respect the work of their employees. My ____ boss ____ always ____ to ____ with ____ in ____ voice. They ____ reluctant ____ acknowledge ____ efforts, but ____ happy ____ be ____ for ____ we ____. But I do acknowledge that the company encourages a healthy work-life balance.
data.partBlankContent: The problem with my superiors at work is that they don't respect the work of their employees. My dir___ boss i_ always spea____ to u_ with disap______ in h__ voice. They a__ reluctant t_ acknowledge o__ efforts, but a__ happy t_ be pra____ for wh__ we accom_____. But I do acknowledge that the company encourages a healthy work-life balance.
data.fullContent: The problem with my superiors at work is that they don't respect the work of their employees. My direct boss is always speaking to us with disapproval in his voice. They are reluctant to acknowledge our efforts, but are happy to be praised for what we accomplish. But I do acknowledge that the company encourages a healthy work-life balance.
data.answer: 我上司的问题是他们不尊重员工的工作。我的顶头上司总是用不赞成的语气对我们说话。他们不愿意承认我们的努力，但很高兴因我们的成就而受到赞扬。但我承认，公司鼓励员工保持健康的工作与生活平衡。
